name: Aussie Pendants
description:
This pendant is made from a recycled souvenir spoon gathered from opportunity shops, treasure & trash markets and collectors. 
Each piece is unique and crafted with care by qualified jeweller Greg Mann in his studio in Melbourne.

It comes with a 45cm chain which matches the pendant.
If you have particular items that you would like created please contact us so we can create your perfect piece.

Find us on Facebook- https://www.facebook.com/GregMannJewellery

Note: Postage does NOT include tracking, insurance, or customs. Thank you very much for your attention.
The Item will be sent within 3-4 business days (not including weekends and holidays) after receiving payment.

name: Cutlery Tie Pins
description:
One-off Pieces!!!
This tie pins are made from recycled cutlery gathered from opportunity shops, treasure & trash markets and collectors. 
Each piece is unique and crafted with care by qualified jeweller Greg Mann in his studio in Melbourne.

It measures approximately 56mm in width.

If you have particular items that you would like created please contact us so we can create your perfect piece.

Find us on Facebook- https://www.facebook.com/GregMannJewellery

Note: Postage does NOT include tracking, insurance, or customs. Thank you very much for your attention.
The item will be sent within 3-4 business days (not including weekends and holidays) after receiving payment.

name: Cufflinks (mix)
description:
They are made from recycled souvenir spoons collected from opportunity shops, treasure & trash markets and collectors. Each pair is unique and crafted with care by qualified jeweller Greg Mann in his studio in Melbourne.

Measurement: 33mm x 24mm. They are presented on a recycled brown card in a gift box.

If you have particular items that you would like created please contact us so we can create your perfect piece.

Find us on Facebook- https://www.facebook.com/GregMannJewellery

Note: Postage does NOT include tracking, insurance, or customs. Thank you very much for your attention.
The item will be sent within 3-4 business days (not including weekends and holidays) after receiving payment.
